thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 04 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Avic Capital's Units Plan To Bring In Strategic Investors, Russian Helicopter JV

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Avic Capital's Units Plan To Bring In Strategic Investors, Russian Helicopter JV
text:
Feb 4 (Reuters) - Avic Capital Co Ltd:
* SAYS ITS UNIT TO SET UP JOINT VENTURE ON RUSSIAN HELICOPTER DEVELOPMENT
* SAYS TO SCRAP PLAN TO ISSUE CONVERTIBLE BONDS * SAYS ITS UNIT PLANS TO BRING IN STRATEGIC INVESTORS TO INCREASE CAPITAL BY UP TO 11 BILLION YUAN ($1.75 billion) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2BTu6vZ ; bit.ly/2FF59H5 ; bit.ly/2nHbaLS Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2984 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
